system.effect: Must have contacts/good reputation with Imperial Guard to acquire this. Hit and Run Attacks Double Hull Damage dealt. Winning opposed command tests defending against boarding adds 1d5 Crew Damage. No Poor, Good/Best add +5 and +10 to Command Tests. One per Vessel.
